text: rajav strikaleat ceadiccu: "yusuphine vasappetuttan sramiccappeal ninnalute anubhavamentayirunnu?” avar parannu: "mahatvam allahuvinu tanne. yusuphinepparri measamayateannum nannalkkariyilla.” prabhuvinre patni parannu: "ippeal satyam velippettirikkunnu. nan addehatte vasappetuttan svayam sramikkukayayirunnu. tirccayayum addeham satyavanan.”
